thread.title: Candidate Ben Carson to speak at Colo. school
thread.title_full: Candidate Ben Carson to speak at Colo. school

author: Deb Stanley
title: Candidate Ben Carson to speak at Colo. school
text:
Previous Next 
LAKEWOOD, Colo. - Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson will speak at Colorado Christian University later this month. 
Carson plans to speak at a rally at CCU on October 29, the day after the Republican presidential candidates debate at the University of Colorado Boulder. 
"We're honored to have Dr. Carson come and present his vision for America, after seeing the way his quiet authority won over Western Conservative Summit delegates in the Denver straw poll this past June,‚Äù said John Andrews, director of Centennial Institute, CCU's think tank. 
Members of the public and students are welcome to attend the rally in the CCU Event Center at 8787 West Alameda in Lakewood. However, reservations are required. Anyone who is interested can sign up at Centennialccu.org . Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
